about_the_game:
Welcome to "Purple Place - Classic Games," a nostalgic adventure featuring three exciting game modes:

Cake Master: Become a pastry chef, bake delicious cakes, and decorate them to perfection. Choose from various flavors and toppings, progressing through levels of increasing difficulty.

Memory Match: Challenge your memory by matching cards on the board. Race against the clock with colorful designs and unlock new levels as you improve your memory skills.

Fashion Frenzy: Dive into the world of fashion as a stylist. Create stunning outfits from a wide selection of clothing, testing your fashion sense and aiming for high scores.

These classic games offer endless entertainment. Whether baking cakes, testing memory, or showcasing your style, "Purple Place" promises fun for everyone. Let the games begin!
detailed_description:
Welcome to "Purple Place - Classic Games," a nostalgic adventure featuring three exciting game modes:

Cake Master: Become a pastry chef, bake delicious cakes, and decorate them to perfection. Choose from various flavors and toppings, progressing through levels of increasing difficulty.

Memory Match: Challenge your memory by matching cards on the board. Race against the clock with colorful designs and unlock new levels as you improve your memory skills.

Fashion Frenzy: Dive into the world of fashion as a stylist. Create stunning outfits from a wide selection of clothing, testing your fashion sense and aiming for high scores.

These classic games offer endless entertainment. Whether baking cakes, testing memory, or showcasing your style, "Purple Place" promises fun for everyone. Let the games begin!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to "Purple Place - Classic Games" a fun-filled game where you'll embark on three exciting adventures like good old times! Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of creativity and challenge.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Belarusian
